The Yulin Haizetan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Yulin City, Shaanxi Province

operators: 陕西亿华矿业开发有限公司 (Shaanxi Yihua Mining Development Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shaanxi Yihua Mining Development Co., Ltd. and owned by Yongtai Technology Investment Company.
